name: places/ChIJVdSCGL1YwokR4JXGE2uxQr4
formattedAddress: 941 Park Ave Suite CD, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 941 Park Ave Suite CD, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: My experiences with Dr. Starkman’s office over the last several years have been ones of professional excellence. The only hiccup has been the reception desk employees, long before COVID-19. They had an excellent front desk team who worked together efficiently. When a major health crisis caused the loss of a crucial member, the remaining staff were overloaded. It became very stressful for them, causing deep frustration with both patients and fellow staff. It’s no longer an issue, as a new rhythm has been settled into. They have also handled COVID with excellency handling remote visits when possible and in-person appointments with their upmost attention to patient safety.

originalText.text:
My first appointment with Dr. Starkman was thorough, he was pleasant and easy to talk to.He was also a gentleman.  Most doctors when you go to see them and they want you to go to another room they generally say follow me. However, Dr. Starkman opened the door for me, and lead me to where he wanted me to go AND made sure I was comfortable before giving instructions to the technician.

The front office staff were pleasant, but  not  too attentive to requests from me, the patient.  I'm still waiting on some information I requested on Monday, October 29th. I was promised it would be sent to me on that day.  Today is Wednesday, October 31st, I haven't received it yet.

originalText.text: Dr. Kokoszka was very caring, patient and helpful. She ordered appropriate tests and I was given a diagnosis along with a plan for taking care of my lower back pain. I'm feeling so much better! I highly recommend her.

text.text: Dr. Kokoszka was very caring, patient and helpful. She ordered appropriate tests and I was given a diagnosis along with a plan for taking care of my lower back pain. I'm feeling so much better! I highly recommend her.

originalText.text:
I was in pain, I had to crawl,
I slowly walked along the wall,
And that is what I had to cope with,
Until I reached the Doctor’s office!

He promptly took away my pain,
I felt like I am young again,
It felt so good, it felt superb,
When I came out, “I jumped the curb”!

A month has passed, and I can see,
I still can jump and bend my knee.
And then, if I will feel some pain,
I’ll go and see my Doc again!

IF

originalText.text:
Horrible Front office  and
Extremely bad customer care

No one confirms appointments or infors you of anything that is going on with the insurance

An awful horrible place to go especially when you are not feeling well

Front desk even hangs up on you when you are trying to explain a situation

Please do not go to this doctor or office on Park Ave .. it is truly horrendous and uncaring
